bio:
Acclary Consulting is a premier IT consulting unit, we are a pool of technology specialist and business acumen. Our team consists of highly qualified IT professionals. With their expertise and experience we have been rendering excellent global consulting. 

At Acclary we treat technology challenges as opportunity to continuously perish. A team of highly qualified and proactive team of young and enthusiastic professionals has formed Acclary. Acclary having expertise in PHP, Mysql, .Net, Java, Wordpress, Drupal, Joomla, Magento, HTML5

We provide IT consulting to our customers with advanced technologies-that best suits our customer's need with due diligence. Acclary has always aimed at providing advanced, quick, efficient, secured, and cost-effective and value added services.

We are always flexible to satisfy our clients needs.

Payment Method:
Based on guru.com directions, all the payments are done through guru.com safepay invoicing and/or escrow only.

We accept payment by Check, Wire Transfer, or SafePay account funds.

We are happy to work as per the agreed milestone basis.

bio:
Have been working in Mobile Application development for 3+ years. 
I have worked in India's Top IT firm TCS as Android application developer and team lead for 2+ years. Worked on solving critical business needs of Global customers like Samsung, Barclays, TMH, CVS Pharmacy in case Enterprise Mobility. I also worked as Team lead handling responsibilities like requirement analysis, delegation of work and deadlines with customers such as SISO and TMH.
After that, I joined vibrant product focused startup Nityaa Labs (Nityaa Technosys Pvt. Ltd.) with mobile app "AirStream" as primary goal. Here also, I worked along with many clients handling services part of the firm. Worked on various projects including domains like education, entertainment, social apps, etc.
I have good experience in Android application development, iOS application development, business development, Project Architecture, Database Architecture and project management.
I can devote as much time needed for completion of project on time.

bio:
With 9 1/2 years of experience in 3D animation, I can create organic and non-organic objects for use in product design or production, animations, game development, or fabrication.  


I work in a timely matter to bring post production designs into their final 3d element, exporting them to multiple formats for use in any 3d package, game engine, or image editor.
My passion is building in 3d, creating works of art or detailed objects of unique design.  I love what I do and put everything into my work.  If you are in need of a 3d artist with the skills and drive then I am that artist, the sky's the limit.

Payment Method:

I accept payments through Check, E-check, or Wire Transfer Funds as provided with Guru.com's SafePay Escrow service.  If another means is required I'm willing to work with you.



Communication:
I conduct business through email and Im services.  For larger projects I'm willing to travel to meet in person if it's within the Cincinnati Tri-State area.


Availability:
I'm available through the work week, Monday - Friday.  I take weekends off to spend time with my family and friends.


Feedback:
Feedback of my work and performance is always appreciated and encouraged after a completed project.

bio:
COMMUNICATION: Direct communication with the client via phone (US) is preferred, however, Zoom, email or other means are acceptable. Finding the right fit is a necessity, and not all personalities mesh.  

Communication is key to completing a project on time. I am generally available every day via email or M-F via phone; however, unscheduled phone calls may reroute to voice mail if I am working on projects - Email is best. Schedules are met if all parties adhere to providing feedback in a timely manner. Weather or other circumstances may result in delays.  

FEEDBACK: I request feedback or endorsements at the completion / payment of each project. This helps others know of my skills and build future projects. Feel free to communicate with me directly to work out any frustrations or questions prior to your feedback.
